data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Saint Paul, Dominica.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Paul, Dominica
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Saint Paul, Dominica.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Saint Paul, Dominica.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Saint Paul, Dominica a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Mahaut
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Mahaut, Saint Paul, Dominica.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 1,764 believers living in Saint Paul, Dominica.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Saint Paul, Dominica, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Paul, Dominica has a population of 9,800.

We estimate Saint Paul has 1,764 people who might know Jesus, 7,261 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 775 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Saint Paul, Dominica to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.
